Author: UnusualReport
Text: You look plenty skinny! you must be tall and very fit.   I feel the same about some inpatient programs may make things so much worse... I feel very strongly repelled against the "overshooting" recovery weight. If they know the struggle why can't they help us become healthy at maybe slightly above the underweight cutoff... like the BMI of 19, and go very slowly from there depending how you feel.
